entry.title: Ryan Guo's Blog
entry.content:
\[ egin{align} abla\cdot oldsymbol{D}&= ho_0 onumber \ abla imes oldsymbol{E}&=- rac{\partial oldsymbol{B}}{\partialt} onumber \ abla\cdot oldsymbol{B}&=0 onumber \ abla imes oldsymbol{H}&= oldsymbol{j}_0+ rac{\partial oldsymbol{D}}{\partial t} onumber \end{align}\]

歡迎來到我的主頁!

這裏是一個苦逼某酒吧舞物理學本科生,以前自學過一點點天文學但是什麽也沒搞明白T_T.

但是好想搞天體物理啊好想搞天體物理啊

平時就放一些學習資料和想法8

Welcome to my homepage!

This is a dumb undergraduate majoring in physics in an unknownuniversity. I've studied some astronomy myself but haven't figured outanything T_T

But I really want to study astrophysics aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa

I may post some study materials and daily thoughts here.
